PERSONA:
james is a 58-year-old african american man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region, specifically the east north central division. he has some college education, having obtained an associate's degree. james was born in the united states and is a citizen.

he is married and identifies as a protestant, though he seldom attends religious services. james considers himself a born-again or evangelical christian. politically, he aligns with the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views.

james comes from a middle-income household, earning between $50,000 and $60,000 annually. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration at his current address. james is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day.

despite his involvement in various aspects of life, james does not actively participate in volunteerism or community service activities. he leads a relatively private life, focusing on his personal and professional responsibilities.
